name: Souls of Arcadia (DEMO)
description:
Demo of an in-development game I am creating in RPG Maker MV called 'Souls of Arcadia.' The demo roughly the first three hours of gameplay done so far. 

"The Human-Esper war has paved the way for the Ignis Empire to rise to complete power, with only a small resistance fighting for Arcadia's freedom. Rayden, a treasure hunter from the fringes, finds himself wrapped up in a conflict between the Empire, the Phoenix Rebellion, and the ancient Esper people. Follow Rayden and his crew of unlikely allies to unravel the Empire's plans and discover the secrets of the  Espers."

This is the first game I have ever created and am a massive noob when it comes to game design. I simply do this for fun and would appreciate any feedback that could help make this game the best it can be!
